unnormalised: Kallzachi toxenki khup mhotvachi, khas korun aizkal, barobor? Kallzachea atak ani stroks vixim ami khup aikotanv, tem thodem bhirantichi zatolem. Punn kardioloji vixim mull gothnni somzolear – mhunnttlear kallzachim kamam pollounnk vantto gheupi voizokicho shakha – tumchea kamacher ravonk khup adhar ditolem. Cricket-achi match pollounche adim nhemonk somzonk tench torem. Tem khup ruchik zata, ani hache kexant, khup komi dabachi.
normalised: Kalzachem arogya khup mhotvachem, khas korun aizkal, barem? Ami heart attack ani stroke vishean itlem aikotanv, tem bhirantichem zaunk xakta. Punn cardiologychem mulbhut gnan – mhonnge voizokshastrachi shakha ji kalzachibobat aasa – tem tumkam vostuncher lagim ravunk khup modot korunk xakta. Cricket-ache niyom samjon gheun match polletale bhaxen vichar kara. Tem anikui ruchikor zata, ani hea kesaan, khup unnem tanau dita.

unnormalised: Atam, ek vost tumi sadharanponni aikotole, ti mhunnttlear kolesterol. Tumcho voiz tumkam oxi sangta astolo "Tumchem LDL 160 mg/dL asa, ami tem khala haddunk zai." LDL mhunnttlear "vait" kolesterol, ani tem khup zalear tumchea dhamnnint ravunk xokta. Tumchea jevnant khup tup asa tench torem kalpan kara, te nimanne mellttolem! Dusrere vatten, HDL mhunnttlear "borem" kolesterol, ani tumka ti sonkhea vhodd zai. Gothnni trasdaik dista zalear voiz tumkam Atorvastatin 20mg ditole.
normalised: Atam, ek vost ji tumi sodanch aikotali ti mhonnge cholesterol. Tumcho doctor axem kaim sangonk xakta “Tumchem L-D-L ekxim saaxtti milligram prati deciliter aasa, ami tem khala haddpak zai.” L-D-L mhonnge “vait” cholesterol, ani tachi zaitich matra tumchea dhamnyanim adda korunk xakta. Tumchea dietan khup ghee aasa taso vichar kara, antakdek, tem dharta! Dusrea vatten, H-D-L mhonnge “borem” cholesterol, ani tumkam ti sankhya anikui voir zai. Doc tumkam Atorvastatin visa milligram diyeta zalea tumchi halat thodi gambhir aasa.

unnormalised: Ani hypertension sarkhea gothnnio asat. Tacho orthuch vhodd rogot dab. Bhov korun, tumcho rogot dab 120/80 mmHg asunk zai. Kitem-i sadharanponni vhodd, 140/90 mmHg sarkem, ani tumi hypertension zonant asa. Hem tumchea kallzacher odik dab haddtta, ani kallan, vhodd proxnank vhorunk xokta. Jivit zoddnechi bodolpachi gothnni mhotvachi asa – nimok komi kor, yoga kar ani dab komi kar.
normalised: Ani tanntun hypertension asat. Tacho orth fokot voir rogtachaap. Tumcho rogtachaap ideal rupan ekxim vis bhaagilem ekaen shtti millimeter of mercury-ache asunk zai. Kaim sodanch voir, mhonnge ekxim cholliis bhaagilem ekaen navad millimeter of mercury, ani tumi hypertension zone-an aasant. Hem tumchea kalzacher zaitich tan dita, ani kaim vellar, vhodd problem zaunk xakta. Jivnashailint bodol mhonnge mukhiel – ruchik uchhvas ugddap korunk, yoga korunk, ani tanav komi korunk.

unnormalised: EKG daktoryan vaporchi ek sadhi vost zaun asa. EKG, vo elektrocardiogram, ek sadhi test zaka tumchea kallzachea vevidik yantrik pod'dotichi mapnni karta. Dhovacho dukh vo duk ani sus zallear ti chalu karta. Daktoryan mhunntto, "Amkam ek 12-leed EKG zai kitem-i arrhythmias nhikarunk." Arrhythmias mhunnttlear neyomit kallzan zoddna zalelea dhadpanchyo gothnni. Report-an "Sinus rhythm okesionol PVCs-achea sangata," dakhoim, jacho arth tumchem kalliz sadharanponni dhadpadta punn thode hichki asat.
normalised: E-K-G ek sadharan vost tumchea samkar yeta. E-K-G, va electrocardiogram, ek sadhi test ji tumchea kalzachi vidyut kriya mazta. Tem sodanch kortat jea vellar tumi chati dukhi va dum gheunk tras zata mhonn sangtat. Doctor sangonk xakta, “Ami bara-lead E-K-G koruya ani irregular kalzache theke nakar koruya.” Arrhythmias mhonnge irregular heartbeat. Report tumkam “Sinus rhythm with occasional P-V-C's,” dakhoita, jeacho orth tumchem kaliz samany rupan dhadhaddaita, punn thode khanche khut zata.

unnormalised: Upchar korpacheo veltanchi bhinnas ani kallzachim gothnninchi dhorti asat. Jivit zoddnechi bodolpachi gothnnipason beta blokar ani ACE inhibitors sarkhich mhonnji veidok upchar, vo angioplasty sarkhich mhonnji probhavyo pankhim zagear dovortat band korun uddoynchi. AIIMS-ant ek kardiolojist, Dr. Rajesh Kumar, tumkam vhodde vatten vhorunk ek borea monis astolo. Apxench daktori upchar korchicho ek vhoddo nho. Sodanch ek daktrechi bhovtat.
normalised: Upchariche marg vegvegle aasa ani te khas kalzache halatiche voir nirbhar aasa. Jivnashailint bodolpasun voizochya vostum poriant mhonnge beta blockers ani A-C-E inhibitors, va angioplasty poriant jea vellar blocked dhamnyam ugddap korunk stent laita. A-I-I-M-S-ak aslo doctor, Doctor Rajesh Kumar, tumkam sarkho marg dakhonk utam. Ughoddap kortat tea voizechem kam tumi kabar koronaka. Sodanch utam voizaki vinchar kara.

unnormalised: To, tumchea vangdda asa – kallzachea voizokichem ek lhaak ani sompem intro. Tem ek okoktaik toxenki asa, punn ashakartanv, he tumkam ek mull gothnnichi somzonni dita. Uzo ani kallza dhakhyal korop khup mhotvachem. Nirogi jevonn jev, karravai rav ani kitem-i lakshanni visar kor naka. Tumchea gharchyadiche voizachea sangata neymit check-ups, kiteak tem vorsak ekdam vo zait zai titlench, sokromak proxnachi kollavnn divonk xokta. Nirogi ravat, lokh!
normalised: Taka, tumkam ailem – ek tornni ani sadhi cardiology-achi mulbhut upades. Tem ek gambhir shetra, punn asa korun, tumkam mulbhut samzon dilem. Dhonvdiva, tumchea kalzachi ghein sambhaln khup mhotvachi. Borem jeva, active ravha, ani kosloi lakxan polleanaka. Ghorchea doctorache lagim regular check-up, vorsak ek fauti va zai zalear, voizokachi garaz lagimchench olkhunk xakta. Borem ravha, lokho!
